availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Wm T Overstreet. (McCracken County, Kentucky, tinner.)

body.p: McCracken County, Kentucky, tinner. Kentucky native. Son of Elmira Overstreet. Tinner in Louisville, Kentucky in 1850. Tinner in McCracken County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson ,Louisville District 3, p. 130.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken, District 2, p. 787.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken, Paducah, 167A.
